Package geometries

Class Intersectable.GeoPoint

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable.GeoPoint
Enclosing interface:
Intersectable
public static class Intersectable.GeoPoint
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class representing a point on a geometry surface
Author:
Dan

    • initCache

      public void initCache​(Vector v)
      Initialize geo point cache data according to the direction of the ray that produced the point. GeoPoint now will include all the info for any functions using it thus avoiding re-calculations
      Parameters:
      v - ray direction
